fields.name: CustomBlockResponseBody
fields.description: If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.

fields.name: CustomBlockResponseStatusCode
fields.description: If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code.

fields.name: EnabledState
fields.description: Describes if the policy is in enabled or disabled state. Defaults to Enabled if not specified.

fields.name: Mode
fields.description: Describes if it is in detection mode or prevention mode at policy level.

fields.name: RedirectUrl
fields.description: If action type is redirect, this field represents redirect URL for the client.
